mapper.select: select id, name, singer, style, issue_date, review_num, cover_url from music group by id, name, singer, style, issue_date, review_num, cover_url order by review_num desc limit 0, #{number};
select name, singer, style, issue_date, review_num from music group by id, name, singer, style, issue_date, review_num, cover_url order by review_num desc limit 0, #{number};
select m.`name`,m.cover_url,m.singer,c.content,c.date FROM music m,`comment` c WHERE m.id=#{id} AND m.id=c.target_id ORDER BY c.date DESC LIMIT 0,#{num}

SELECT COLUMN_NAME as columnName, COLUMN_COMMENT as columnComment FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'music' and (COLUMN_NAME = 'name' or COLUMN_NAME = 'singer' or COLUMN_NAME = 'style' or COLUMN_NAME = 'issue_date' or COLUMN_NAME = 'review_num') ;
